In September of 2004, the committee on the theory of risk (COTOR) created sample data and asked actuaries to fit a loss distribution to the data.

https://www.casact.org/research/cotor/index.cfm?fa=round2

The file may be found here: https://www.casact.org/research/cotor/COTORChallengeClaims.xls

This data is also found in the R package [raw](https://cran.r-project.org/package=raw). Its appearance in that package is documented [here](http://pirategrunt.com/raw_package/COTOR2.html).
